content:
FILE_WRITTEN:src/metrics/plots.py
DIR_STATE:["src/metrics/evaluation.py", "src/metrics/plots.py"]
Summary: Implemented a compact plotting module that generates reliability, PR/ROC, and failure-mode bar charts from aggregated metrics JSON and saves PNG/SVG artifacts.
